short_summary: bid on wooden sortation cases and related parts
description: Canada Post seeks a supplier to provide A-32 Wooden sortation cases and associated spare parts, used within various Canada Post Corporation facilities to support ongoing mail sortation operations.
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement: A-32 Wooden Sortation Case & Spare Parts

#### Date Added
April 13, 2023

#### Tender Closure Date
Tuesday, April 10, 2023, 14:00:00

#### Contract Start Date
Wednesday, April 11, 2023

#### Contract End Date
Wednesday, April 11, 2023

#### Solicitation Reference Number
GSIR211698

#### Procurement Agency
Canada Post Corporation
N0751-2701 Riverside Drive
Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0B1
Canada

#### Solicitation Description
Canada Post is seeking a supplier to provide A-32 wooden sortation cases and associated spare parts for use within various Canada Post Corporation facilities to support ongoing mail sortation operations. Bidding and documents are available on [www.merx.com](http://www.merx.com). Please note that fees may apply for access.

#### Contracting Party
Canada Post Corporation
N0751-2701 Riverside Drive
Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0B1
Canada

#### Contact
Tender Control Officer
tender.control@canadapost.ca
613-734-7863
https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2439494031/abstract?language=EN

#### Competition Type
Competitive - Open bidding

#### Trade Agreements
This tender is open to suppliers participating in the following trade agreements:

* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Compliance
Canada Post Corporation requires that tenders are sent electronically through [www.merx.com](http://www.merx.com) by the specified deadline to ensure valid bidding.

Look forward to assisting with this project! Let me know if there's anything else I can do for you. Cheers, Pat
 Kushal Sheladia
TC Tech Writing @ YourService
